title: Using Genetics as a Tool for Disease Diagnosis
itunes:title: Using Genetics as a Tool for Disease Diagnosis
description:
Katherine Stueland, President and CEO of GeneDx, discusses developing genomic testing as a means for preventative medical treatment rather than solely an indicator of risk.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
